data.title: Noboru Iguchi’s Space Girls (Eng Sub)

data.text:
DDL | Archive

Released by SOD in 2001.

Story: An alien virus descends upon Tokyo. Those infected start vomiting blood and later turn into crazy violent zombies. In order not to die, the infected people have to see women defecate. This is the story of 5 women affected by the event.

Noboru Iguchi is a well-known cult director of such films as Karate Robo Zaborgar and The Machine Girl nowadays, but he actually had his start in the AV world as a director of extreme fetish productions for companies like SOD and V&R.

Ah, Ultraseven and Cutie Honey get parodied. The original runtime was a whooping 2+ hours, but the entire story arc (which is arguably pretty funny) is compiled into a 30 minute abridged version. The rest of the “story” is just various iterations of literal shit p*rn, as this was originally an extreme fetish video. But if you’re interested in Iguchi’s body of work and want to learn how he started out, but have a weak stomach, this might be for you! Rough English subs were added just because no one else is ever gonna pick this up (just press CC). Please excuse any and all mistakes and/or missing lines.

This semi-worksafe edit does not contain any 18+ scenes, or depictions of women shitting, eating that shit, or vomiting that shit out to eat it again. This is a shitless version. You can now safely watch it at the dinner table along with your family and friends! Well… maybe not. The main reason is that it can be posted onto a public site like this. Not kinkshaming, but no way I’m posting scat. By the way, a clip from this got famous as a viral shock video in the early internet days. Yodeley-he-he.
